name: Pewdie Mania
description:
Pewdie Mania was a game originally created for the PewDiePie game jam. It was the first Jam ever I participated in, and this is what I came up with.

In Pewdie Mania, you will be faced with a random challange every turn. If you don't manage to complete the challange, you will lose 1/3 lives. If you are out of lives, you die. Pretty simple.

When you complete a challange, you will advance to the next stage. The game will get progressively harder as you climb up the levels. Try to reach level 100!
